name: SparkChess Mini
description:
This is a mini version of the full-featured game.

SparkChess is the only chess game that puts fun first. With a choice of boards, computer opponents and online play, it delivers a first-class experience that is as accessible to experts as it is to beginners, kids and anyone else who wants to discover how entertaining this ancient strategy game really is. 

The chess game that everyone can enjoy!

Too many chess games are impossible for anyone but the experts and masters. The real test of a truly intelligent chess game isn't how hard it is to beat, but how well it can adapt to players of all skill levels. That's exactly what makes the award-winning SparkChess stand out. 

Whether you're brand new to the chess board, looking to to improve your game, to teach your kids to play, or are ready to take it to the next challenging level, everyone can find the perfect balance in SparkChess. 

FEATURES: 

  • Practice chess against the computer or challenge your friends in multiplayer.
  • Child- safe design, with built-in anti-abuse measures built-in.
  • Choose from different boards: 2D, 3D and a stunning fantasy chess set. 
  • A simple user interface that makes it easy to set up and play games. 
  • Choose from different computer opponents depending on your level. 
  • Play casual, quick or expert games, depending on your needs. 
  • The only chess game that appeals to beginners and experts alike. 
  • Track your multiplayer progress with statistics.
  • Create and join teams.
  • Save your games and play them again.
  • Export games in PGN format.
  • Chat in multiplayer mode.
  • Watch and comment on live multiplayer games.
  • Large and friendly community of chess lovers from all over the world. 

Young or old, beginner or advanced, SparkChess gives you the extra edge to become a better chess player while having fun!
